md:
## About this tab:
Domain: 02 Finance
Tab Name: Expense Breakdown
URL: https://dl.ya.cloud/finance?tab=exp001
Number of views: 112
Path: 02 Finance / Expenses / Expense Breakdown
Short description: Dashboard showing operational and capital expenses across departments.
Text elements: Highlights departments with over-budget spending.
Filters: Date, Department, Expense Type

## About charts on the tab:
### Piechart Expense Share by Department
Description: Expense, distribution across departments
Fields:
  - colors:
    - department (DIMENSION)
  - section_y:
    - expense_amount (MEASURE)

### Linechart Cumulative Expenses Over Time
Description: Trends, in monthly cumulative expenses
Fields:
  - colors:
    - expense_type (DIMENSION)
  - section_y:
    - cumulative_expense (MEASURE)
  - section_x:
    - month (DIMENSION)
